Title: Provides for tuberculosis screenings outreach and services in epidemic areas and makes an appropriation therefor
Summary: Provides that the department of health shall establish a program, or enhance existing programs, for the prevention, early diagnosis and treatment of cases of tuberculosis in areas of the state where the incidence of tuberculosis prevails at epidemic levels; provides that such program shall provide a standardized level of care for the systematic, routine and periodic examination of men, women and children residing in such areas; appropriates $8,000,000 therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 22 Title 2 ยง2220, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to tuberculosis screening, outreach and services and making an appropriation therefor
